H0.text: Which model village did Samuel Greg build to house workers at his nearby Quarry Bank Mill. Bollington

H1.text: Which model village did Samuel Greg build to house workers at his nearby Quarry Bank Mill. Wilmslow

H2.text: Which model village did Samuel Greg build to house workers at his nearby Quarry Bank Mill. Poynton

H3.text: Which model village did Samuel Greg build to house workers at his nearby Quarry Bank Mill. Styal

A4.text: By the 1820s, the mill was expanding and, because of its rural location, Greg found the need to construct a new model village nearby to provide housing for his workers.

A5.text: Styal village grew during the early years of the Industrial Revolution when industrialist Samuel Greg built Quarry Bank Mill, a cotton mill and textile factory.
